name: Wood Warden(Autoghost)
author: ywkls
info: Creates an enemy that makes 3 fake copies of itself; then randomly chooses which one to become at the start and after each part dies.
description: A large tree and 3 copies. After you defeat one, another comes to life. Once you defeat them all, the fight is over.Update- 9-6-15- Added a projectile that it throws which splits into 4 smalls projectiles. Added an invulnerability phase where it sinks into the ground and rises up again.
setup: Create two enemies- both 3 x 4. Make the second invulnerable to everything.Create 8 combos in this order- facing up, facing down, facing left and facing right.Then 3 combos for the sinking/rising animation- sank one tile, sank two tiles, sank three tiles.Then a combo using a blank block of 3 x 4 combos. (The one used by the invisible combo is good for this.) Create a sprite for the limb. Change constants to match your game.Requires- std.zh, string.zh, ghost.zh
